attributes.name: Material-Property-Descriptor Database
attributes.description: Material-Property-Descriptor Database (MPDD) of atomic structures. Optimized for the high-throughput deployment of material featurizers and ML models and maintained by Phases Research Lab (phaseslab.org) at The Pennsylvania State University

attributes.name: OPTIMADE Providers Index Meta-Database
attributes.description: The list of OPTIMADE providers maintained by Materials-Consortia
